data.persona: I am poor and uneducated. I wish I had a spell to make my dreams come true. I have more hope than sense.
data.description:
You are in the A cabin.
Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin.  In a field of wildflowers, there is also a pen for the chickens, a clothes line.
There's an a clothes line, a well, a pen, a mystical necklace with a colorful crystal, a clothes line, an a pen for the chickens, two wildflowers, and a Plain, pretty basic wooden cabin here.
The cat is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: get mystical necklace with a colorful crystal

data.short_motivation: I am attracted by the value of the necklace and want to have it
data.mid_motivation: I want to find a buyer for the necklace
data.long_motivation: I want to make a large amount of money and improve my living conditions

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put mystical necklace on gown pocket
